name: BocaRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask boca radio what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask boca radio to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boca radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: One Great Classic Hit After Another. The best of the 70's and 80's with a touch of the 60'S and 90's. Plus hour long weekend specials: Sunday at the Sixties, Seventies Saturdays and 80's Flashback. Tune in for The History of Rock and Roll with Wink Martindale every weekend on Boca Radio.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
